questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Architecture and streetscape
D) Wildlife and animals

What situation does the photo depict?

B) A busy city street
C) A quiet residential street
D) A family gathering

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A large tree
B) A yellow building
C) A group of people
D) A body of water

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A car
C) A yellow building
D) A bicycle

A) A mountain range
B) More trees and buildings
C) A beach
D) A river

A) A grassy area
B) A playground
C) A lake
D) A busy road

B) Yellow
C) Red
D) Green

D) Thatched roof
